      • clamp

        public static double clamp​(double minValue,
                           double maxValue,
                           double value)
        METHOD: Clamp a value to given positive and negative bounds
        Parameters:
        minValue - The negative bound to clamp to
        maxValue - The positive bound to clamp to
        value - The value to clamp
        Returns:
        The clamped value
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If upper and lower bounds result in a range of less than 0

      • lerp

        public static double lerp​(double p1,
                          double p2,
                          double pos)
        METHOD: Linearly interpolate to a value a given distance between two given values
        Parameters:
        p1 - The first value to interpolate between
        p2 - The second value to interpolate between
        pos - The position between the two points as a value between 0 and 1, with 0 representing p1 and 1 representing p2
        Returns:
        The value a distance along the line (p1, p2) of pos

      • rLerp

        public static double rLerp​(List<Double> p,
                           double pos)
        METHOD: Recursively linearly interpolate between each value in the given list to find the value the given distance between each of them
        Parameters:
        p - The list of vales to interpolate between
        pos - The distance along each line as a value between 0 and 1, with 0 representing the start of each set of points and 1 representing the end
        Returns:
        The value interpolated pos distance between each point in p
